articles.title: Interest on withdrawal liability under ERISA can't be retroactive - 2nd Circuit
articles.description: A U.S. appeals court on Thursday said the amount of money employers owe when they withdraw from underfunded multiemployer pension plans must be calculated using the interest rate in effect at the time, and not a different one imposed retroactively.'

articles.title: Australians flee massive bushfires as new fire threat looms

articles.title: Four rockets hit Iraqi military base near Baghdad airport: Police

articles.content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Four Katyusha rockets struck a military base next to Baghdad International Airport on Friday, Iraqi police sources said. 
Reporting by Ahmed Rasheed; Editing by Sandra Maler
